title: pH of mixture of acid and base

content.question: A solution is prepared by mixing <math alttext="0.50 liter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>L</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="0.40 molar H N O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.40</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>HNO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> with <math alttext="0.50 liter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>L</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="0.20 molar K O H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.20</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mi>M</mi><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>KOH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. If it is assumed that volumes are additive, the <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of the resulting mixture will be which of the following?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
